<h3 id="X31475">X(31475) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {INCIRCLE, 2nd LEMOINE, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -(b^2-c^2)^2+6*S*a^2+(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2  :  :
